articles.title: After Swirling Around a Black Hole, Matter Just Falls Straight In - Universe Today
articles.description: The physics surrounding black holes is just plain weird. A gravitational well so strong that not even light can escape can do some pretty strange things to normal matter. Over the decades, plenty of theories have been put forward about what those strange thin…
